item.title: Single Page Application (SPA) Project Template
item.author: jkat98@gmail.com (Jason Krol)
item.description: I started going through the process of deconstructing John Papa’s amazing CodeCamper Single Page Application project and trying to break it down to a basic stripped down project template. I love a lot of what was accomplished in that project (great DI, awesome Repositories and patterns, etc.)! While breaking down the project, I’ve learned quite a bit. I’ve posted the full source of the template to my github, but its still a work in progress.
